original_title: 15 Sri Lankan underworld figures in custody in foreign countries: Minister
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka’s Public Security Minister Ananda Wijepala says that a total of fifteen Sri Lankan underworld figures with Interpol ‘Red Notice’ issued against them are currently in the custody of authorities in foreign countries, including Russia, Oman, India and Dubai in UAE.
He stated that they will be brought back to Sri Lanka once security issues are concluded in the respective countries.
The minister revealed this while delivering a statement in the Parliament on Thursday (11).
